contentrichtext.text: '''Quality Bakers''' is a New Zealand brand of bread products. Quality Bakers forms part of the [[Goodman Fielder]] food company and has bakeries throughout Australia and New Zealand. The products are marketed under the following brands: In Australia:- *Helgas *Sunicrust *Mighty Soft *Buttercup *Wonder White/Gold In New Zealand:- *Quality Bakers Natures Fresh *Quality Bakers Fibre White *World Oven *Molenberg *Vogels *Sunnycrust *Country Split *Freyas *Mackenzie Country This is in addition to producing generically branded bread products for most of the major supermarket chains in Australia and New Zealand. ==External links== *[http://www.goodmanfielder.com.au/ Goodman Fielder Website] [[Category:Bakeries of Australia]] [[Category:New Zealand brands]] [[Category:Goodman Fielder brands]] {{food-product-stub}}
